Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Amidst the hundreds of Amsterdam bars, strolling through the streets I stumbled upon this charming bar (circa 1619) not expecting much.  Met the bartender Christian and made a new friend.  What a host!  Christian was awesome! The upper …

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Elderly lady at the bar is so rude. We had a blast here for 4 consecutive days but then she was serving and it was terrible. She asked our friend to leave because he didn't want to order anything (and venue was empty). The rest of discussion with her was pointless and unpleasant.

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: At the gate of Amsterdam this English orientated pub is suited. Relaxed atmosphere enjoying various lagers and a football match.

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: 6-7€ for Scottish single malt whiskeys they offer is bargain. Nice place, nice staff.

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Great Guinness, top staff. Christian is best barman in Amsterdam.

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Deadly little bar great staff and atmosphere Defo be back again

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Great place to runaway from the AMS crowds. Many beers to order.

Name: Buster’s
Review Text: Take the seeting by the windows. Outside there is always something crazy happening. And the place is nice itself.
